languages.text: "Твоя... решимость заставляет меня усомниться в том, что я обладаю всеми необходимыми уликами. Возможно, с трибуналом стоит повременить. Ненадолго". {n}Ее оскорбленный взгляд не обещает вам ничего хорошего.{/n}
"Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твоя... решимость заставляет меня усомниться в том, что я обладаю всеми необходимыми уликами. Возможно, с трибуналом стоит повременить. Ненадолго". {n}Ее оскорбленный взгляд не обещает вам ничего хорошего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her offended gaze does not bode well.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “你的……无畏之举不得不让我心生疑虑。或许我的证据还不够充分，或许我应该暂缓这场宣判，暂时而已。”{n}她看起来愤怒不已，目光中带着恶意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你的……无畏之举不得不让我怀疑，或许我的证据还不够充分。或许我应该暂缓这场宣判，暂时而已。”{n}她露出了受到冒犯的表情，目光中带着恶意。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前の…恐れ知らずな行為には辟易する。もしかすると、評決は保留すべきなのかもしれない。少しの間だけだが」{n}彼女の憤怒の表情を見る限り、先が思いやられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前の…恐れ知らずな行為には辟易する。もしかすると、評決は保留すべきなのかもしれない。少しの間だけだが」{n}彼女の憤怒の表情を見る限り、先が思いやられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Su... intrepidez me da motivos para dudar de la insuficiencia de mis pruebas. Tal vez debería aplazar el veredicto. Brevemente». {n}Su expresión ofendida no presagia nada bueno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su... intrepidez me da motivos para dudar de la insuficiencia de mis pruebas. Tal vez debería aplazar el veredicto. Brevemente». {n}Su mirada ofendida no presagia nada bueno.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Eure ... Unerschrockenheit lässt mich zweifeln, ob mir auch wirklich ausreichend Beweise vorlagen. Vielleicht sollte ich mit meinem Urteil noch warten. Kurz." {n}Ihr erzürnter Ausdruck verheißt nichts Gutes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure ... Unerschrockenheit lässt mich zweifeln, ob mir auch wirklich ausreichend Beweise vorlagen. Vielleicht sollte ich mit meinem Urteil noch warten. Kurz." {n}Ihr pikierter Blick verheißt nichts Gutes.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Votre... intrépidité me donne des raisons de douter de la suffisance de mes preuves. Peut-être devrais-je attendre encore un peu avant d'annoncer mon verdict. » {n}Son regard furibond n'augure rien de bon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre... intrépidité me donne des raisons de douter de la suffisance de mes preuves. Peut-être devrais-je attendre encore un peu avant d'annoncer mon verdict. » {n}Son regard offensé n'augure rien de bon.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Senin bu... Cesaretin, delillerimin yeterliliğinden şüpheye düşmem için sebep sağlıyor. Hükmümü erteleyeceğim. Bir süreliğine." {n}Öfkeli yüz ifadesi, çok da umut vermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your... intrepidity gives me reason to doubt the sufficiency of my evidence. Perhaps I should hold off on delivering the verdict. Briefly." {n}Her outraged expression does not bode well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Senin bu... Cesaretin, bana delillerimin yeterliliğinden şüpheye düşmem için sebep sağlıyor. Hüküm vermeyi erteleyeceğim. Bir süreliğine." {n}Öfkeli yüz ifadesi iyiye işaret değil.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
